Question: Korea Creative Content Agency (KOCCA) CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Korea Creative Content Agency (KOCCA)

Participating in CES 2024, KOCCA will showcase 15 Korean tech content companies introducing their latest AI, SaaS, virtual human, deep learning, and XR technologies. The participating companies have been selected based on excellence and innovation, reflecting prominence in the industry and R&D sector in Korea and worldwide. KOCCA will organize a side-event called 'KOCCA Night' to facilitate business opportunities between America and South Korea, featuring more than 15 Korean tech and content companies exhibiting at CES 2024, government officials, ecosystem partners, and corporate professionals. The event will include talk shows, pitching, and networking sessions. KOCCA aims to support Korean content entrepreneurs and promote Korean content globally, fostering new technologies and expanding Korean content to the world.
Summary_cn:
韩国创意内容机构（KOCCA）
参加2024年CES的KOCCA将展示15家韩国技术内容公司，介绍他们最新的人工智能（AI）、软件即服务（SaaS）、虚拟人、深度学习和扩增现实（XR）技术。这些参展公司是根据在韩国和全球产业和研发领域的卓越性和创新性而被选拔的。KOCCA将组织一场名为“KOCCA之夜”的活动，促进美国和韩国之间的商业机会，活动将展示超过15家韩国技术和内容公司参展CES 2024，以及政府官员、生态系统合作伙伴和企业专业人士。活动将包括讲座、项目推介和交流会。KOCCA旨在支持韩国内容创业者，并在全球范围内推广韩国内容，培育新技术并将韩国内容带向世界。
